name: SpeedCubes (Potatosaucevids)
description:
This game is in beta.

How fast can you beat a level?

SpeedCubes is a fast paced game that is all about speedrunning through hard levels and getting the lowest time possible globally. Race your way through 5 levels while avoiding obstacles in your way, like explosive landmines, turrets, and Red grounds!

SpeedCubes is made with Construct

The SpeedCubes logo, and the SpeedCubes Banner is made by Hurgsonik https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCuriUQ7NDnVDgT16G1DsYxQ

sounds from Soundbible

Kyeboard button images made by Nicolae Berbece.
